description: Published requests or offers, sometimes with what is expected in return.

name.description: An informal or formal textual identifier for the proposal.

purpose.description: The type of proposal, whether offer or request.

publishes.description: References to vf.planning.intent records that are the primary intents of this proposal.

reciprocal.description: References to vf.planning.intent records that are the reciprocal intents of this proposal.

proposedTo.description: DIDs of agents to which the proposal is published.

eligibleLocation.description: Reference to a vf.geo.spatialThing where the proposal is valid.

listedIn.description: Reference to a vf.proposal.proposalList this proposal is part of.

unitBased.description: This group of commitments contains unit based quantities which can be multiplied. Default false.

hasBeginning.description: The beginning date/time of the proposal's validity.

hasEnd.description: The ending date/time of the proposal's validity.

created.description: The date/time the proposal was created.

note.description: Any useful textual information about the proposal.
